title: Texas House passes hemp expansion bill - This Changes EVERYTHING

scenes.visual_description: Retail store setting, customers browsing, character interacting naturally
Chief Steve appearing nervous, hand gestures defensive, comic sweat drops
Split screen confrontation, dramatic music cue, tension building
Characters shaking hands or nodding agreement, harmony restored, education moment
Character delivering wisdom, sunset/inspiring background, uplifting conclusion

characters.name: Dro (Hydro)
catchphrases: The best in Texas, believe me

dialogue.line: Just another day at Reggie & Dro, serving the finest legal hemp in Texas...
But wait - Chief Steve has questions. And 100%, they're the wrong questions.
Chief Steve, with all due respect, the law is crystal clear. ≤0.3% THC, tested by third parties, 21+ only. It's unbelievable.
See? When you follow the regulations and educate people, everybody wins. That's the Texas way.
The moral of the story? Education beats fear every time, believe me. Legal hemp is fantastic for Texas.

advocacy_message: Third-party lab testing ensures every product meets Texas DSHS standards. By the book.

viral_hooks.opening: Texas just made history and nobody's talking about it...
viral_hooks.closing: ...stay tuned for tomorrow. You're not gonna want to miss this.
quotable_lines: "Texas hemp is phenomenal - winning big time, believe me."
"≤0.3% THC, 100% legal, 1000% Texas. That's compliance, folks."
"They said it couldn't be done. We did it anyway. That's the Texas way."
"From seed to sale, every step is phenomenal. No shortcuts, no compromises."
"The cannabis revolution is here, and Texas is leading the charge."

current_event_tie_in.hook: Texas House passes hemp expansion bill
current_event_tie_in.angle: Political momentum, bipartisan support, freedom wins
